Best Deals! Roses are Red Funny Chili Poem Valentine’s Day Holiday Card – Valentines Day Cards This item is trending! Roses are Red Funny Chili Poem Valentine’s Day Holiday Card good product Roses are Red Funny Chili Poem Valentine’s Day Holiday Card You can read more about itFun card to leave anonymous with roses are red poem – perfect for Valentine’s Day. The design features lots of red and green chillis and skinny font typography. The poem reads, Roses are red, Violets are blue, Chilies are hot and so are you! (You can edit the wording for American or British spelling of Chili / Chilli). Price:$1.91
